title: Nuclear power from Berkeley
brief_description: The opening by HRH Prince Philip of Berkeley Nuclear Power Station, the world’s first large-scale commercially operated nuclear power station. Looks at this new power plant through the eyes of a turbine engineer who has been connected with the project since its inception.
